entry.title: Aurora-Straight Tube Water Pipe-Clear-8in
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Water Pipe
Price: 29.99

Clean and clear, and ready to smoke. This stylish water pipe from Aurora delivers the hits.

  • High quality borosilicate glass
  • Straight tube
  • 14.5mm male quartz banger
  • No carb hole
  • Clean minimalist design

 

One of the biggest names in Cannabis also brings you some of the very best in smoking accessories. With hand pipes, water pipes, papers and more, you really can’t go wrong with this very mindful Aurora collection. Simple, minimalist design deliver on both form and function. Pick up these primo Aurora products today!

This no-nonsense straight tube rig is perfect for at home sessions but is also small enough to travel with. Standing 8”/20.32cm tall, this water pipe provides a cool draw and excellent water filtration. Made from handblown, borosilicate glass, this piece comes equipped with a honeycomb percolator, that provides superb diffusion and a super smooth draw. The fixed downstem and 14.5mm ground joint provide perfect positioning for the 14.5mm male quartz banger. Quartz is perfect for bangers because it heats up quickly and still maintains excellent flavour.

This all clear piece has a clean, minimalist design and features the Aurora printed in black on the side. Its eye-catching contemporary design will make this rig an awesome addition to any connoisseur’s collection.

 

DIFFUSER TYPE

N/A

JOINT SIZE

14.5mm

GLASS THICKNESS

5mm

HEIGHT

8 in / 20.32cm

MATERIAL

Borosilicate Glass

COLOR

Clear and black

BASE

Straight tube

PERCOLATOR TYPE

Honeycomb

entry.title: Aurora-Marble Ash Tray-4.25in
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Ashtray
Price: 11.40

Keep things tidy and smoke in style with this Marble Ashtray from Aurora.

  • Solid marble construction
  • Features 4 notched joint holders
  • Wind-resistant ash bowl
  • Contemporary yet classic design
  • Suitable for indoor and outdoor use
  • Dimensions: 4.25 in x 4.25 in (10.795 cm x 10.795 cm)

One of the biggest names in Cannabis also brings you some of the very best in smoking accessories. With hand pipes, water pipes, papers and more, you really can’t go wrong with this very mindful Aurora collection. Their seriously cool marble ashtray is a real class act that will add sophistication to any smoking lounge and really bring the room together.

This ashtray’s design is contemporary, yet classic. Modern, yet timeless. It features four notched joint holders which wall off a wind resistant ash bowl. While it can of course be used for ash, it can also serve as a stylish container in which to keep your busted-up buds for more convenient packing or rolling.

Its solid marble construction means it can easily withstand the elements, making it suitable for both indoor and outdoor use. Wherever you place it or however you use it, this ashtray will always provide a rock-solid look and a touch of class.

entry.title: San Rafael-Hammer Pipe-Blue-5.4in
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Hand Pipe
Price: 14.99

Feeling blue? San Rafael is here to help. This comprehensive collection includes everything from water pipes, to trays and grinders. With their classic blue shade at the forefront of the design, these minimalistic accessories will be at the top of everyone’s list.

Sick of spoon pipes? Grab a hammer! The fun shape and large bowl on this piece make smoking sessions a dream. The left side choke helps regulate air flow and provides the perfect hit. Made from handblown, borosilicate glass and sitting 5”/12.7cm in length this pipe provides cool, clean draws. 

Adorned with a classic San Rafael image on the front, the minimalistic logo doesn’t take away from the stunning style of this pipe. The unique blue fumed coloring makes it worthy of any connoisseurs collection.

entry.title: San Rafael-Beaker Water Pipe-Blue-12in
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Water Pipe
Price: 19.99

Feeling blue? San Rafael is here to help. This comprehensive collection includes everything from water pipes, to trays and grinders. With their classic blue shade at the forefront of the design, these minimalistic accessories will be at the top of everyone’s list.

This clean and stylish beaker is perfect for at home sessions. Sitting 12”/30.48cm tall, this water pipe provides a cool draw and excellent water filtration. Made from handblown, borosilicate glass this piece comes equipped with an 18.8mm ground joint and 18.8mm>14.5mm diffused downstem to make your hit superbly smooth. Easily pull out the bowl and complete your hit with the 14.5mm male, glass, herb bowl with handle. The bullet-hole ice pinch lets you pop a couple cubes in the top, ensuring a frosty finish.

This clear beaker is sure to impress, with it’s sleek design and pops of colour. A San Raf blue mouthpiece is complimented by the classic logo on the side. This functional piece is the ideal addition to any smokers collection.

entry.title: San Rafael-Straight Tube Water Pipe-Blue-16in
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Water Pipe
Price: 26.90

Feeling blue? San Rafael is here to help. This comprehensive collection includes everything from water pipes, to trays and grinders. With their classic blue shade at the forefront of the design, these minimalistic accessories will be at the top of everyone’s list.

This 16”/ 40.64cm straight tube water pipe from San Raf definitely packs a punch. Made from handblown, borosilicate glass and equipped with a thick, sturdy base this showpiece stands out. This straight tube comes outfitted with two tree percolators making your hit incredibly smooth. The 18.8mm ground joint fits perfectly with the inside-cut 18.8mm> 14.5mm diffused downstem. This piece also comes with a 14.5mm glass, male herb bowl with handle. The handle helps to remove the bowl easily while smoking and cleaning. The tough, bullet-hole ice pinch lets you toss a couple cubes in the top to add a frosty finish to your hit.

The clear design blends in, while the height of this straight tube stands out. The blue on the mouthpiece adds a pop of colour and matches the classic San Raf logo on the side. If you’re looking for a tall, smooth bong able to impress, this is the piece for you.

entry.title: Aurora-Beaker Water Pipe-Clear-8in
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Water Pipe
Price: 22.40

One of the biggest names in Cannabis is here to bring you the best in smoking accessories. From hand pipes to water pipes and a plethora of papers, you can’t go wrong with this well thought out collection. Simple in design, but functional in nature grab these awesome Aurora pieces.

This beaker base rig is small enough to take on the go, but perfect for at home sessions. It sits 8”/20.32cm and is made from handblown, borosilicate glass. It comes equipped with an 18.8mm ground joint and an inside-cut 18.8mm>14.5mm diffused downstem. This helps break up the smoke and provides a smoother draw. This rig also comes with a 14.5mm male quartz banger. Quartz is an ideal material to use as it heats up quickly and provides quality flavour. The sturdy bullet-hole ice pinch allows you to pop a few cubes in the top to ensure a frosty finish.

The sleek, clear design of this piece is perfect for the minimalist and is adorned with a black Aurora logo on the side. The unique top helps this piece stand out, making it a connoisseur collectors dream rig.

entry.title: San Rafael-Grinder Medium-Blue-50mm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Grinder
Price: 9.99

Feeling blue? San Rafael is here to help. This comprehensive collection includes everything from water pipes, to trays and grinders. With their classic blue shade at the forefront of the design, these minimalistic accessories will be at the top of everyone’s list.

This aluminum 3-stage grinder’s top is sealed with a magnetic closure to help keep everything secure. Use the chisel-tip teeth to tear and fluff your herbs to perfection. The bottom two layers are threaded together to ensure the safety of your ground material. Once optimally ground in the top section the material moves down through the holes to the mid-section. This compartment is ideal for storing your ground herbs. The most potent pieces will filter down through the mesh screen and land in the kief compartment, the secret space where the best bits are kept. 

This 50mm/ 2” grinder has comfort grooves on the sides for a more ergonomic grind. The stunning blue colour is complimented by the classic white San Rafael logo on the top of the grinder. Fun and functional, this grinder is sure to impress.

entry.title: San Rafael-Bus Metal Tray-Blue-Medium
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Rolling Tray
Price: 7.49

Feeling blue? San Rafael is here to help. This comprehensive collection includes everything from water pipes, to trays and grinders. With their classic blue shade at the forefront of the design, these minimalistic accessories will be at the top of everyone’s list.

Keep your session essentials all in one place with the help of this metal rolling tray. Made from high quality aluminum, this sturdy tray is made to last. Measuring 6.25 x 10.5”/15.88 x 26.67cm, this tray can be taken on the go but is an ideal size for at home smoking. The tray has a non-stick surface and rounded edges, this helps prevent your herb from getting stuck in the corners.

With it’s classic dark blue coloring and fun, bus imagery, this San Rafael tray is the perfect addition to your collection.

entry.title: Famous X Tray of 24 16.5 FT Hemp Wick
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous X
Type: Accessory
Price: 39.99

Famous X Hemp Wick is made from hemp string coated in organic beeswax. A healthier, tastier alternative to lighting whatever you happen to be smoking. No more inhaling gross fumes from your lighter, just clean, pure beeswax and hemp. It burns at a lower temperature so you get a much smoother hit. Your lighter will last longer as well, simply light the end of the string and hold the lit end over your bowl. Super convenient (and sticky) hemp wick is designed to wrap around your lighter (or pipe) for handy hits whenever the mood strikes. Famous X hemp wick is 16.5ft, and comes in a tray of 24.

entry.title: Grinder Metal Aurora Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Grinder
Price: 7.49 - 12.49 (3 variants)

This aluminum 3-stage grinder has a magnetic closure and uses diamond-cut teeth to perfectly tear and fluff your herbs. It then falls through the holes onto the fine, mesh screen. The threaded mid-section securely holds what you want to save for later. Your finest, most potent material filters down through the screen and is captured in the large kief reservoir at the bottom.

Available in small 40mm, medium 50mm, and large 62mm.

entry.title: Water Pipe Aurora Straight Tube
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Water Pipe
Price: 38.99

Made from thick, borosilicate glass this 11” straight tube water pipe has a wide base. Featuring a black rim on the mouthpiece and a stylish Aurora decal on the side this elegant piece is simplicity personified.  The pinch enables you to add ice for frosty hits, the removable downstem has diffusion slits and the glass-on-glass bowl is a 14mm fitting.

entry.title: Water Pipe Aurora Beaker
entry.summary:

Type: Water Pipe
Price: 29.99

Made from thick, borosilicate glass this water pipe has a wide, beaker base. Featuring a black rim on the mouthpiece and a stylish Aurora decal on the side this elegant piece has a minimalistic design. The pinch enables you to add ice for frosty hits, the removable downstem has diffusion slits and the glass-on-glass bowl is a 14mm fitting.

entry.title: Taster Pipe
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Hand Pipe
Price: 4.90

Made from thick, borosilicate glass this straight and simple pipe is perfect for a small hit. This 3.5” pipe features a decent size bowl and a built-in screen to prevent ash from traveling toward the mouthpiece. A small glass bump is on the side to prevent your pipe from rolling away. The clear glass is emblazoned with an Aurora decal on the side.

entry.title: Straight Bubbler Glass Aurora Clear and Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Bubbler
Price: 12.49

This 6” Straight Bubbler made from thick, borosilicate glass delivers a clean, smooth hit. It features a diffused downstem to diminish rough draws and a left side choke to help regulate air flow. Adding water to your smoking experience makes it much more enjoyable, and this piece is no exception. Available in Black and Blue and adorned with an Aurora decal by the mouthpiece.

entry.title: Sherlock Hand Pipe
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Sherlock Pipe
Price: 7.49

This Sherlock Hand Pipe is made from thick, borosilicate glass and is 4” in length. The mouthpiece features a built-in ash catcher to prevent ash from going into your mouth, and is adorned with an Aurora decal. The deep bowl has a permanent honeycomb screen which is ideal for people who tend to lose or break their removable ones. The left-side choke helps regulate air flow. Available in Clear, Black and Blue.

entry.title: Rolling Tips (Tray)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Rolling Tips
Price: 50.00

These filters by Aurora help make your joint complete. Nobody likes getting debris in their mouths while they smoke, well nobody I’ve met anyway. Fold and roll these little tips to help prevent that and give yourself something to hold onto. Buckle up, you’re in for a smooth, smoky ride.

entry.title: Pipe Spoon Aurora Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Spoon Pipe
Price: 9.99

This Spoon Pipe is made from thick, borosilicate glass and is 4” in length. The flute mouthpiece allows for optimal comfort while being used and is adorned with an Aurora decal. The deep bowl is ideal for packing large amounts and the left-side choke helps regulate air flow.

entry.title: Organic Hemp Single Width (Tray)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Aurora
Type: Rolling Paper
Price: 22.00 - 29.48 (2 variants)

Organic Hemp Single Width w/ Tips (22 per tray)

Aurora’s Organic Hemp Single Wide papers are medium weight making them excellent for rolling both dry and sticky herbs. Organic Hemp is easy to roll making them perfect for beginners and connoisseurs alike. They burn evenly while smoking and don’t tear while rolling. Utilizing Organic Hemp, these papers use natural ingredients and forgo gross chemicals. The glue used is vegan and sugar-based which is ideal for those who don’t want to smoke animal by-products. Short and sweet, these papers allow for a modest joint perfect for solo sessions. This pack comes with rolling tips for your convenience. 50 papers and tips per pack.

Organic Hemp Single Width (50 per tray)

Aurora’s Organic Hemp Single Wide papers are medium weight making them excellent for rolling both dry and sticky herbs. Organic Hemp is easy to roll making them perfect for beginners and connoisseurs alike. They burn evenly while smoking and don’t tear while rolling. Utilizing Organic Hemp, these papers use natural ingredients and forgo gross chemicals. The glue used is vegan and sugar-based which is ideal for those who don’t want to smoke animal by-products. Short and sweet, these papers allow for a modest joint perfect for solo sessions. 50 papers per pack.
